description.value: Vaccine Product Codes - representing the codes of the products currently available.

The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the current status of the administered dose of vaccine.
Vaccine type Codes, containing the different types of antigens used in vaccine guidelines.

display.value: Measles virus+Mumps virus+Rubella virus dose count in combination vaccine

description.value: Questionnaire for registering the events leading to and including the administration of a vaccine
